=STELLOPT Compilation on Hydra (RZG-IPP)= 

This page details how to compile the STELLOPT family of codes on Hydra at [[@http://www.rzg.mpg.de/|Rechenzentrum Garching]] (RZG-MPE). In order to do so you will need an account on their system. These build instructions are for the Intel based compilers
----
Installation Steps
# Load the necessary modules files
> [[code]]
module load intel
module load mkl
module load mpi.ibm
module load fftw petsc-cplx slepc-cplx
module load netcdf-mpi hdf5-mpi nag_flib/intel/mk24
[[code]]
# Now create a directory in which you wish to compile STELLOPT and place the STELLOPT ZIP file in that directory. Then unzip it.
# Unzip stellinstall
# Now you should be able to run the setup script and compile the STELLOPT family of codes.
